findings.title: Skill name does not follow agent skills naming rules
findings.description: Skill name 'ABM Outbound' is invalid. Agent skills require lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only, with a maximum length of 64 characters.

findings.title: Skill does not specify a license
findings.description: Skill manifest does not include a 'license' field. Specifying a license helps users understand usage terms.
findings.remediation: Add 'license' field to SKILL.md frontmatter (e.g., MIT, Apache-2.0)

findings.title: TOOL CHAINING ABUSE detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects suspicious tool chaining patterns that could lead to data exfiltration: get my note?" email
findings.snippet: 5. **Track by channel** — Know which channel drives replies
findings.remediation: Review and remove tool chaining abuse pattern

findings.title: CREDENTIAL HARVESTING detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects potential exposure of sensitive information like API keys, passwords, tokens, and certificates: export APIFY_API_KEY="your_key
findings.remediation: Review and remove credential harvesting pattern

findings.title: CREDENTIAL HARVESTING detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects potential exposure of sensitive information like API keys, passwords, tokens, and certificates: export APOLLO_API_KEY="your_key
findings.remediation: Review and remove credential harvesting pattern

findings.title: CREDENTIAL HARVESTING detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects potential exposure of sensitive information like API keys, passwords, tokens, and certificates: export SCRIBELESS_API_KEY="your_key
